title: Portfolio Animation System
summary: A dynamic portfolio website featuring smooth animations, Three.js background effects, and responsive design. Built with React, TypeScript, and Framer Motion for seamless user interactions.

title: iOS Mobile Experience
summary: A progressive web app designed to feel native on iOS devices. Features offline caching, touch gestures, and app-like navigation patterns optimized for mobile users.

title: Circular Planner
summary: An innovative 24-hour planning interface using circular design patterns. Features drag-and-drop functionality, time blocking, and export capabilities for productivity management.

title: Fashion Palette Generator
summary: A creative tool for generating harmonious color palettes for fashion design. Uses color theory algorithms and machine learning to suggest complementary colors and seasonal trends.

title: Brainwave Simulator
summary: An interactive visualization of brainwave patterns and EEG data. Features real-time data processing, customizable frequency bands, and educational content about neural activity.

title: Security Dashboard
summary: A comprehensive security monitoring dashboard with real-time threat detection, vulnerability scanning, and compliance reporting. Features terminal-style UI and advanced analytics.
